<div style="text-align: center">
# {{< fa face-frown >}} Page Not Found {{< fa face-frown >}}
The page you have requested cannot be found<br>(perhaps it has been moved or renamed).

Look at this random XQCD comic instead:

<div id="xkcd-comic" style="margin: 20px auto; max-width: 600px;">
  <p>Loading random xkcd comic...</p>
</div>

<script>
async function loadRandomXkcd() {
  try {
    // Get latest comic number
    const latestResponse = await fetch('https://xkcd.com/info.0.json');
    const latest = await latestResponse.json();
    
    // Get random comic
    const randomNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * latest.num) + 1;
    const comicResponse = await fetch(`https://xkcd.com/${randomNum}/info.0.json`);
    const comic = await comicResponse.json();
    
    // Display comic
    document.getElementById('xkcd-comic').innerHTML = `
      <h3><a href="https://xkcd.com/${comic.num}" target="_blank">${comic.title}</a></h3>
      <img src="${comic.img}" alt="${comic.alt}" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto;">
      <p><em>${comic.alt}</em></p>
    `;
  } catch (error) {
    document.getElementById('xkcd-comic').innerHTML = '<p>Could not load xkcd comic. <a href="https://xkcd.com" target="_blank">Visit xkcd.com</a></p>';
  }
}

// Load comic when page loads
loadRandomXkcd();
</script>

Or, please return from whence you came and try again.
</div>
